casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Donald Durrant FARROW No. 341P12-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 2, 2018 Mr. Donald Durrant Farrow, for Farrow, Donald Durrant Ms. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 11th of June 2018 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Durham County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of July 2018."

Ervin, J. recused
